ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Bard Crowd Control
ygData.msgSnippet: I occasionally have had some problems with resists on High Blues - particularly in Skyfire... I ll have to try again. I agree with all your comments. Slyde ...
ygData.messageBody:
I occasionally have had some problems with resists on High Blues -
particularly in Skyfire... I'll have to try again.

I agree with all your comments.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 13, 2000 9:55 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] RE: Bard Crowd Control


---------------------------------------------------------------------_->

Slyde, yes I'm 52 now but I have charmed something all the way up and
everywhere we went and not had noticeable resists. I also thought your
comment was you were having trouble charming blues. We rarely have an
enchanter so if the pull is too many, I use charm to deal with spares. I'm
<snip>
